mapper.insert:
insert into Cause
causeId,
causeName,
occurrencedTime,
endTime,
lastModifyTime,
createdTime,
owner,
createdBy,
updatedBy,
remark,
parentId,
causeType,
delFlag
#{causeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{causeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{occurrencedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{causeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}
mapper.update:
update Cause
parentId=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
causeType=#{causeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
causeName = #{causeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
occurrencedTime=#{occurrencedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
endTime=#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lastModifyTime=#{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createdTime=#{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
owner=#{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createdBy=#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updatedBy=#{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delFlag=#{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}
where causeId = #{causeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from Cause where causeId = #{causeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delFlag=0
